title: aram bots
body:
i feel that by putting bots in aram they have taken the need to be cautious away when u play at certain times, Another issue i found is a large problem is someone might have three games with bots in it then get used to the pace of play after they play there next game maybe the opposing team may not have any bots but u do making it nearly impossible to win thus making gameplay in aram less desireable 

 if anybody else feels this way can u please post on my discussion and maybe they will remove the bots due to unhappy players

replies.body:
**Riot aren't the ones putting bots in ARAM. **

The bots are run by people looking to create accounts to bot their way to level 30 so they can sell them off. 

It's annoying, and it can easily put lower level players off learning the game (as it is more of an issue in lower level games as well as co-op vs ai). Riot regularly update their bot detection system and quite a few of the accounts get banned, although because it is a profitable business, the people running the bots are continuously updating their scripts so they are one step ahead of detection. It's a pretty vicious cycle. 

You and other players can do your part to assist Riot in their war against bots/botted accounts and report these accounts in the end of game screen under the 3rd party software option. Keep in mind that these punishments are permabans on first offence, however are not instant punishments. It may take a while for the ones you are seeing now to be punished, as bot bans usually come out in waves.
